director.name: 多纳泰拉·巴格利沃 Donatella Baglivo

this_title: Franco Zeffirelli - La mia vita in una scatola di pellicola
introduction: An exclusive behind the scenes of Franco Zeffirelli's Tea with Mussolini, where the Maestro speaks about his life and art. "It was one of the first subjects which I wrote when I was assistant to Visconti and thought that sooner or later I should took the plunge to become a director. I didn't have a troubled childhood, from psychological discomfort of any kind, absolutely not. I have always been loved with affection and attention, even if the family situation was like this particular. I've always had people who loved me. As a child I liked art, music, sport... I was a very lively kid."
chinese_title: Franco Zeffirelli - La mia vita in una scatola di pellicola
